means.word_mean: （表示惊奇）已经，都 ；（强调情况或问题存在）已经 </seg>

expand_knowledge_list.cn: yet表“已经”时，通常用于否定句和疑问句中；already则用于肯定句

entry.def: You use already to show that something has happened, or that something had happened before the moment you are referring to. Speakers of British English use already with a verb in a perfect tense, putting it after 'have', 'has', or 'had', or at the end of a clause. Some speakers of American English use already with the simple past tense of the verb instead of a perfect tense.
entry.tran: 已经（用already时，英国英语中动词用完成时态，美国英语有时则用一般过去时）

example.ex: They had already voted for him at the first ballot...
example.tran: 在第一次投票选举时，他们已经投票给他了。

example.ex: The group has already shed 10,000 jobs...
example.tran: 该集团已经裁去1万个工作岗位。

entry.def: You use already to show that a situation exists at this present moment or that it exists at an earlier time than expected. You use already after the verb 'be' or an auxiliary verb, or before a verb if there is no auxiliary. When you want add emphasis, you can put already at the beginning of a sentence.
entry.tran: 早已（用于be动词或助动词之后，或一般动词之前，表示强调时可置于句首）

example.ex: The authorities believe those security measures are already paying off...
example.tran: 当局相信那些安全措施已经奏效。

means.word_mean: 1. prior to a specified or implied time;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from all(as an adverb) + ready ; sense 2is influenced by Yiddish use

sentences.cn: 你已经不打算走了，是不是？
sentences.en: You're not leaving already, are you?

sentences.cn: 我已经迟到了。
sentences.en: I'm already late.

sentences.cn: 已经有太多的人了。我们再也接待不了啦。
sentences.en: There are far too many people already. We can't take any more.

sentences.cn: 都10点钟了？
sentences.en: Is it 10 o'clock already?

sentences.cn: “午餐？”“不，谢谢，我已吃过了。”
sentences.en: ‘Lunch? ’ ‘No thanks, I've already eaten. ’

sentences.cn: 我们及早到了那里，但是迈克已经离开了。
sentences.en: We got there early but Mike had already left.

sentences.cn: 他已经很富有了。
sentences.en: He was already rich...

sentences.cn: 当局相信那些安全措施已经奏效。
sentences.en: The authorities believe those security measures are already paying off...

sentences.cn: 在第一次投票选举时，他们已经投票给他了。
sentences.en: They had already voted for him at the first ballot...

sentences.cn: 该集团已经裁去1万个工作岗位。
sentences.en: The group has already shed 10,000 jobs...

sentences.cn: 灰泥弯掉是因为房子的掉落.
sentences.en: The plaster has buckled because of the settling of the house.

sentences.cn: 生产已经走上轨道.
sentences.en: Production has already been put on the right track.

sentences.cn: 著作已经脱稿.
sentences.en: The work is already complete inmanuscript.

sentences.cn: 环境污染的程度已经很高.
sentences.en: There is already a high level of environmental contamination.

sentences.cn: 这些承诺已遭背弃.
sentences.en: These commitments have already been breached.

sentences.cn: 他已被记过三次.
sentences.en: He already has three demerits on his record.

sentences.cn: 最好事先把这些沉重的箱子运走,这样我们到达时,箱子已经到了.
sentences.en: It's best to send the heavy cases ahead so that they'll be there already when we arrive.

sentences.cn: 你已经写完作文了 吧 ?你动作真快.
sentences.en: Have you finished your composition already? You are very speedy.

sentences.cn: 危机业已酿成.
sentences.en: The crisis has been already brought on.

sentences.cn: 我打电话去时,他已走了.
sentences.en: He had already left when I called.

sentences.cn: 他已经肯定获得那份工作了,口头审查仅是形式而已.
sentences.en: He is already assured of the job and his interview is a mere formality.

sentences.cn: 她嘲笑那种认为通货膨胀已被消除的观点.
sentences.en: She scorned the view that inflation was already beaten.

sentences.cn: 我还以为他们已经到那儿了.
sentences.en: I take it for granted that they have arrived there already.

sentences.cn: 重复和确认一些早已被人熟知或接受的东西是几乎没有回报的。
sentences.en: Little reward accompanies duplication and confirmation of what is already known and believed.

sentences.cn: 换句话说，如果你要做纸质版，就将目标锁定在那些早已痴迷于此的人身上。
sentences.en: In other words, if you’re going to make a print product, make it for the people who are already obsessed with it.

sentences.cn: 我环顾四周, 但是那个司机早已不在了.
sentences.en: I looked around, but the driver already gone.

sentences.cn: 殊不知西方流行经济学早已陷入危机的困境.
sentences.en: Little imagine west sheds an economics to be immersed in the predicament of the crisis already.

sentences.cn: 他的建议早已经被拒绝了.
sentences.en: His proposal has already been turned down.

sentences.cn: 她早已答应了出演电影中的主角.
sentences.en: She has already agreed to play the lead character in the film.

sentences.cn: 进入十月, 业主们早已进入到火热的装修中.
sentences.en: Into October, the owners already entered the hot decoration.

sentences.cn: 很多人可能早已觉得法国人爱发牢骚, 然而一项最新调查表明法国人竟然也对此表示认同.
sentences.en: Many may already see France a nation ofgrumblers, but a new survey shows the French agree.

sentences.cn: 其竞争对手早已开始了收购和整合工作.
sentences.en: Its competitors have already begun the acquisition and integration work.

sentences.cn: 春天早已过去, 花季早已擦肩而去.
sentences.en: Spring has already passed by, has already wiped the shoulder and left in adolescence.

sentences.cn: 想获得伟大的 友谊,去向那些早已有伟大友谊的人学习.
sentences.en: Want to have a great relationship? Learn from those who already have one.

sentences.cn: 哪知, 在我们以前的世代,早已有了.
sentences.en: It has already been, in the ages before us.

sentences.cn: 考利昂妈妈穿着她的黑色寡妇服, 早已坐在汽车里等她了.
sentences.en: Mama Corleone, dressed in her widow black, was already sitting in it, waiting for her.

sentences.cn: 因此,人在任何时候都会有压力, 我早已习惯.
sentences.en: Therefore the human will have at any time the pressure, I will already be familiar with.

sentences.cn: 如果他这样做, 所有的人早已经在地狱里了.
sentences.en: If he did, we'd all be in hell already.

sentences.cn: 即便如此, 关于白酒即将涨价的消息,早已在消费者中不胫而走.
sentences.en: Even so, prices on liquor is about news consumers already spread like wildfire.

sentences.cn: 两公司早已在飞机引擎方面开展了合作.
sentences.en: The two companies have already carried out in the aircraft engine cooperation.

sentences.cn: CORBA作为 当今最流行的几种网络 管理协议, 其安全性早已受到人们的重视.
sentences.en: As the most popular network mangement protocol , the securities of SNMP? CMIP and CORBA already been noticed.

sentences.cn: 这时他早已忘记了思嘉的心碎,一心只想着去捉弄那管家.
sentences.en: He had already forgotten Scarlett's heartbreak and his mind was only on playuing his valet.

sentences.cn: 汤姆早已到了听不见我们声音的地方.
sentences.en: Tom was already out of hearing.

sentences.cn: 这些事实表明中国早已掌握并不断发展分配器设计技术.
sentences.en: This fact indicates that China has already mastered, and has been continuously improving, its dispenser design technique.

sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳早已坐在越野车的前排座位上,向特工下达着指示.
sentences.en: Katherine was already in the front seat of the SUV giving the agent directions.

sentences.cn: 该国经济主体早已处于国家控制之下.
sentences.en: Major elements of the country's economy are already under state control.

sentences.cn: 那批材料早已订购,要想改变计划已经晚了.
sentences.en: It's late in the day to think of a change of plan when we've already ordered the materials.

sentences.cn: 隐瞒是没有用的, 他早已泄漏了秘密.
sentences.en: It's no use to hide. He has spilled the beans already.

sentences.cn: 维也纳早已在4月13日陷落.
sentences.en: Vienna had already fallen on April 13.

sentences.cn: Unix早已经经历过若干次这样的转化了.
sentences.en: Unix has already undergone several such transformations.

sentences.cn: 这证据与侦探们早已掌握的情况完全吻合.
sentences.en: This evidence ties in very well with the picture which detectives have already built up.

sentences.cn: 约翰诞生的消息和他使命的奇妙意义早已传遍各地.
sentences.en: Already the forerunner was born, his mission attested by miracle and prophecy.

sentences.cn: 也会骂我没用, 但我早已习惯.
sentences.en: Shouting at me is useless. am already used of it.

sentences.cn: 你已经不打算走了，是不是？
sentences.en: You're not leaving already, are you?

sentences.cn: 我已经迟到了。
sentences.en: I'm already late.

sentences.en: There are far too many people already. We can't take any more.

sentences.en: We got there early but Mike had already left.

sentences.cn: 他已经很富有了。
sentences.en: He was already rich...

sentences.en: The authorities believe those security measures are already paying off...

sentences.en: They had already voted for him at the first ballot...

sentences.cn: 该集团已经裁去1万个工作岗位。
sentences.en: The group has already shed 10,000 jobs...

sentences.cn: 安特吉公司似平已经认识到，既然它在佛蒙特州已经名誉扫地，那么和州政府再打一场官司也不会造成更大损失。
sentences.en: The company seems to have concluded that its reputation in Vermont is already so damaged that it has noting left to lose by going to war with the state.

sentences.cn: 例如，他提出这样一种理论：一名法官因为担心在犯罪面前表现得太心慈手软，如果一天当中已经宣判其他五、六名被告人执行强制性的社区服务，那么他就极有可能把某个人送进监狱。
sentences.en: For example, he theorised that a judge fearful of appearing too soft on crime might be more likely to send someone to prison if he had already sentenced five or six other defendants only to forced community service on that day.

sentences.cn: 也许，《纽约时报》已经在这么做了。【句子解析】本句是一个复合句,主语Which指代④句的内容，系动词是may be, what引导的表语从句作表语。从句的主语是the Times，谓语是is doing,what在从句中作宾语;副词already作状语。
sentences.en: Which may be what the Times is doing already.

sentences.cn: 世界艺术品市场在经历了自2003年以来的急剧增长后，相当长一段时间以来已经失去 了其原有的发展势头。
sentences.en: The world art market had already been losing momentum for a while after rising bewilderingly since 2003.

sentences.cn: 巧合的是，美国军队已经开始研究这一问题。
sentences.en: As it happens, America's armed forces are on the case already.

sentences.cn: 在世界的很多地方，可再生能源已经成为一种主要能源。
sentences.en: In many parts of the world renewable energy is already a principal energy source.

sentences.cn: 选择这一称呼的原因是它呼应了种族群体，例如“意大利裔美国人”和“爱尔兰裔美国人”，这些称呼都已经不带有种族歧视色彩了。
sentences.en: This one was chosen because it  echoed the labels of groups, such as  “ Italian Americans ” and  “ Irish Americans, ” that had already been freed of widespread discrimination.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 机器人已经帮我们节省了时间、金钱和精力。
sentences.en: Robots already save us time, money and energy.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 当然，无所不在的电池已经得到了长足的发展
sentences.en: The ubiquitous (无所不在的) battery has already come a long  way,  of  course.
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 实际上议会已经授权政府限制烟草贸易。
sentences.en: Parliament has in fact already authorised the government to  tame  the  tobacco  trade.

sentences.cn: 如果唐宁街有足够的决心，这种监管就应该已经实施起来了。
sentences.en: With sufficient will in Downing Street this would have  been  done  already.
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 有些气候影响可能已经露出端倪。
sentences.en: Some climate impacts may already be discernible.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 但是，小学教师的工资低并不表示小学教育不重要。这只是说明小学教师的数量已经过剩了。
sentences.en: A low wage for elementary school teachers, however, doesn’t mean elementary education isn’t important. It simply means there’re too many elementary school teachers already.
sentences.from: 18年6月六级真题(第一套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: 处于这个阶段的人已经形成了自己的身份形象、积累了一定资源，并且正是因为根基已经牢固，你现在也有了能够承担更大风险的可能性。
sentences.en: Your identity has been formed; you’ve built up your resources; and now you have the chance to take the big risks precisely because your foundation is already secure.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 事实上，我希望重过一段我已经过过的时光：20 世纪60 年代——那时我20 多岁，而且一切都在更新中。
sentences.en: In fact, I’d like to relive a period I’ve already lived: the 1960s—I was in my twenties, and everything was being renewed.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 事实上，我已经联系了和我住一个房间的其中一个女孩，她看起来非常友善。
sentences.en: As a matter of fact, I’ve already contacted one of the girls who would be living in the same house as me, and she seemed really nice
sentences.from: 18年6月四级真题(第二套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 所以现在我们已根据先前提交给贵司的3D设计图纸开模了.
sentences.en: So we had already made mould according to the 3 D design paper we sent you before.

sentences.cn: 他们中的大多数是在校生,只不过先前是由学校对这些学生进行资助的.
sentences.en: Most of them are already in universities but being carried and funded by the universities themselves.

sentences.cn: 其实, 从先前谈话出现的词语中来挑选翻译用词,才是最好的.
sentences.en: In fact, the best words chosen for translation already appear in the previous talks.

sentences.cn: 我已强调了这一事实,即真理大多是用先前存在的多个真理制定的.
sentences.en: I have already insisted on the fact that truth is made largely out of previous truths.

sentences.cn: 一位先前的患者已经表明了他要起诉的意图.
sentences.en: One former patient already indicated his intention to sue.

Sentence.sentence: Your identity has been formed; you've built up your resources; and now you have the chance to take the big risks precisely because your foundation is already secure.
